name: Bionicle: City of Legends
storyline: The game was set before the Matoran moved to Mata Nui, and it was about the Toa Metru's adventures in the City of Metru Nui." - Videogame Wikia (FANDOM)
summary: Bionicle: City of Legends is a cancelled 3D action-adventure and platformer game based on the Lego Bionicle Series. The game was being developed by Argonaut Games, and was going to be released for the PlayStation 2 and Xbox. However, Argonaut Games was liquidated before it was released. All that remains is an old tech demo of the game.
